text: Xeniamia atrithorax, is a species of cardinalfish in the family Apogonidae found in South China Sea off Khanh Hoa Province in Vietnam. This species is the only member of its genus. X. atrithorax is a possibly luminous species. ==References== Category:Apogonidae Category:Monotypic marine fish genera Category:Taxa named by Thomas H. Fraser
title: Xeniamia
